question: Super Bowl LVIII: Will Usher's first song of the Super Bowl LVIII Halftime Show be "My Way"?
description:
This market will resolve to "Yes" if Usher's first song of the Super Bowl LVIII Halftime Show is "My Way". Otherwise, this market will resolve to "No".

If Usher doesn't perform at all this market will resolve to "No."

The primary resolution source for this market will be official information from the NFL and live footage from Super Bowl LVIII, however a consensus of credible reporting may also be used.

events.title: Super Bowl: Usher's first song in Halftime Show?

question: Super Bowl LVIII: Will Usher's first song of the Super Bowl LVIII Halftime Show be something else?
description:
This market will resolve to "Yes" if Usher's first song of the Super Bowl LVIII Halftime Show is any song other than "My Way", "OMG", "Yeah!", or "DJ Got Us Fallin’ In Love". If Usher doesn't perform at all this market will also resolve to "Yes."

Otherwise, this market will resolve to "No".

The primary resolution source for this market will be official information from the NFL and live footage from Super Bowl LVIII, however a consensus of credible reporting may also be used.

events.title: Super Bowl: Usher's first song in Halftime Show?

question: More migrant encounters at border in February compared to January?
description:
This market will resolve to "Yes" if there are more Southwest border encounters in Feb 2024 compared to Jan 2024 (see https://www.cbp.gov/newsroom/stats/southwest-land-border-encounters). Otherwise, this market will resolve to "No."

This market will resolve based on the first report of data for Feb 2024 compared with the Jan 2024 at the time of February's release, regardless of future revisions.

The resolution source is https://www.cbp.gov/newsroom/stats/southwest-land-border-encounters.

The resolution source is https://www.cbp.gov/newsroom/stats/southwest-land-border-encounters.

question: Wormhole token FDV less than 4 billion a week after airdrop?
description:
On Feb 7 Wormhole announced an upcoming token, and distribution/airdrop plan for it (see https://wormhole.com/wormhole-w-tokenomics/): "The Community has been allocated 17% of the token supply... 11% of this allocation will be unlocked at TGE and will be distributed during the initial phases of the TGE, including the TGE-related airdrop (and related activities)."

This market will resolve to "Yes" if the Fully Diluted Valuation of Wormhole's token is less than $4,000,000,000 1 week after its first community airdrop. Otherwise, the market will resolve to "No."

"1 week after its first community airdrop" is defined as 168 hours after the first community airdrop starts. The resolution source for this market is CoinGecko, specifically the "Fully Diluted Valuation" metric. If Wormhole doesn't airdrop by December 31, 2024, 11:59:59 PM ET, this market will resolve to "Yes."

events.title: Wormhole Market Cap (FDV) one week after airdrop?

question: Wormhole token FDV between 4-5 billion a week after airdrop?
description:
On Feb 7 Wormhole announced an upcoming token, and distribution/airdrop plan for it (see https://wormhole.com/wormhole-w-tokenomics/): "The Community has been allocated 17% of the token supply... 11% of this allocation will be unlocked at TGE and will be distributed during the initial phases of the TGE, including the TGE-related airdrop (and related activities)."

This market will resolve to "Yes" if the Fully Diluted Valuation of Wormhole's token is between $4,000,000,000 (inclusive) and $5,000,000,000 (exclusive) 1 week after its first community airdrop. Otherwise, the market will resolve to "No."

"1 week after its first community airdrop" is defined as 168 hours after the first community airdrop starts. The resolution source for this market is CoinGecko, specifically the "Fully Diluted Valuation" metric. If Wormhole doesn't airdrop by December 31, 2024, 11:59:59 PM ET, this market will resolve to "No."

question: Super Bowl: Taylor Swift shown more than 5 times?
description:
This market will resolve to "Yes" if, during the official broadcast of Super Bowl LVIII, between the start of the National Anthem and the final whistle, Taylor Swift is shown on-screen more than 5 times (i.e. 6 or more times). Otherwise, this market will resolve to "No".

"Times" refers to discrete instances where Taylor Swift is clearly visible. These instances must be separated by shots where Taylor Swift is not clearly visible on screen.

Note: Only live appearances count (commercials and videos recorded in the past won't count).

The primary resolution source for this market will be the official NFL broadcast of Super Bowl LVIII, however a consensus of credible reporting will also be used.

Note: Only live appearances count (commercials and videos recorded in the past won't count).

question: Will 2024 have the hottest February on record?
description:
This market will resolve to "Yes"  if the data for the Global Land-Ocean Temperature Index for February 2024 shows an increase of 1.38°C or greater when it is released. Otherwise, this market will resolve to "No".

An anomaly of 1.38°C or greater for February 2024 is necessary and sufficient to resolve this market to "Yes" immediately once the data becomes available regardless of whether the figure for February 2024 is later revised.

The primary resolution source for this market will be the figure found in the table titled "GLOBAL Land-Ocean Temperature Index in 0.01 degrees Celsius" under the column "Feb" in the row "2024" (https://data.giss.nasa.gov/gistemp/tabledata_v4/GLB.Ts+dSST.txt). If NASA's "Global Temperature Index" is rendered permanently unavailable, other information from NASA may be used. If no information for February 2024 is provided by NASA by April 1, 2024, 11:59:59 PM ET, this market will resolve "No."

question: Tucker Carlson + Putin interview over 300 million views on X in first 24 hours?
description:
On Feb 8 Tucker Carlson posted his interview with Putin to X: https://x.com/TuckerCarlson/status/1755734526678925682.

This market will resolve to "Yes" if Tucker Carlson's interview with Vladimir Putin gets over 300 million views in the first 24 hours of its posting. Otherwise this market will resolve to "No."

The resolution source for this market will be the view count at 6:25 PM ET on Feb 9 on the interview post on X: https://x.com/TuckerCarlson/status/1755734526678925682.

question: Will Biden drop out by Friday?
description:
This market will resolve to "Yes" if President Joe Biden officially announces his withdrawal or is confirmed to have withdrawn from the 2024 US presidential race by February 16, 2024, 11:59 PM ET.

In the event of any extenuating circumstances that prevent Joe Biden from continuing the race within the market timeframe, this market will also resolve to "Yes".

If Joe Biden does not drop out or is not forced to withdraw from the 2024 Presidential Election by 12:00 AM ET on February 17, 2024, this market will resolve to "No".

The primary resolution source for this market will be official information from Joe Biden or his official/legal representatives, however a consensus of credible reporting will also be used.

The primary resolution source for this market will be official information from Joe Biden or his official/legal representatives, however a consensus of credible reporting will also be used.
